CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1946, pg. 18 reads: "Trinity Anniversary Successful - An overflow crowd attended the all-day program celebrating the forty-second anniversary of Trinity AME Chuch of Pittsburgh, last Sunday. The event also commemorated the anniversary of forty-two years in ministry for the pastor, the Rev. B.W. Ford.  Left to right are the Rev. Mr. Ford, the Rev. S.J. Wright, Bishop D. Ward Nichols of the Ninth Episcopal District, AME Church, principal speaker; the Rev. J.W. Henderson and the Rev. Hubert N. Robinson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. Ford, Rev. S. J. Wright, Bishop D. Ward Nichols, Rev. J. W. Henderson, and Rev. Hubert N. Robinson, standing behind altar in Trinity AME Church for forty-second anniversary
